name: wix-ui-tpa-connected
description: Connection of Wix UI TPA to settings made simple

scripts.clean: npm run clean-components && npm run clean-styles && npm run clean-configs && rm -rf ./cache || true && rm -rf ./dist || true
scripts.clean-components: find *.js | grep -v jest.config.js | xargs rm || true
scripts.clean-styles: find *.css | grep -v jest.config.js | xargs rm || true
scripts.clean-install: rm -rf ./node_modules || true && rm ./package-lock.json || true && npm install

author: Vytenis Urbonavicius
